GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/users/login.description: allows the user to log into their account.

POST /api/users.description: allows the user to register for an account, and will log them in if successful.

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: allows the user (or an admin) to delete the user account.

GET /api/users/:username.description: allows conditional access to get information about a user's account.
